Name: Beatus Creation Solitaire
About the game: 【Breaking barriers just to meet you!】 Play with VTuber super crew “Beatus Creation” in the classic card game “Spider Solitaire”! Unlock new themes designed based on each member of Beatus Creation using the coins you earn each time you clear a stage. Use the stickers to decorate your sticker book and create your very own album! - Each member of the Beatus Creation crew voices each character - 100 puzzles to solve ranging from easy to hard difficulty levels - User-friendly functions such as “Hints” and “Redo (once)” are available in-game - Simple controls for quick and easy gameplay to enjoy during your free time
